item.title: I dont understand how to make nonwild zones
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Ah, my mistake, no, the second Y coord is northeast.

absX >= COORD

Is the southwest X Coord

absX <= COORD

Is the northeast X Coord

absY >= COORD

Is the southwest Y Coord

absY <= COORD

Is the northEAST Y Coord

Fixed my mistake.

Read full topic

Yes, it has to be that.

Oh, no wonder why I can’t make Varrock Square a non wildy zone… TYVM again :D[br][size=1]Posted on: May 11, 2007, 11:16:55 PM[/size][hr]You mean the second Y coord is southEAST right?

item.title: I dont understand how to make nonwild zones
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:2, topic:92983”]No.

absX >= COORD

Is the southwest X Coord

absX <= COORD

Is the northeast X Coord

absY >= COORD

Is the southwest Y Coord

absY <= COORD

Is the northwest Y Coord[/quote]

Does it HAVE to be southeast coord and northwest coords? Can it just like be any coord?

item.title: I dont understand how to make nonwild zones
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

“if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) ||”.
Why is it absx >=coords && absx >=coords && absY >=coords && absY >=coords?

Shouldn’t it be absX, then absY, then absX, then absY for the ranges?

Read full topic
